Control Name: 1.13 Ensure API keys are restricted to use by only specified Hosts and Apps
Control Statement: Unrestricted keys are insecure because they can be viewed publicly, such as from within a browser, or they can be accessed on a device where the key resides. It is recommended to restrict API key usage to trusted hosts, HTTP referrers and apps.
